The original: undoctored photograph was taken in July 2013 and recorded the U.S. senators meeting with Hamid Karzai, the former president of Afghanistan.
The photograph of McCain: Graham, and Karzai was originally posted by the Arizona senator on Twitter.
A comparison of the genuine photograph o: Graham, and Karzai with the doctored image of the U.S. senators and Osama bin Laden shows that the terrorist leader's head was simply pasted atop the former Afghanistan president's body.
The video claiming that the photograph s: Graham, and bin Laden posing after a "deep state fundraiser" was associated with the unfounded right-wing conspiracy theory #Qanon.
